page.title: 01Gazetteer
page.content: The area includes the south-east corner of Wellingborough, the north-west of the village of Great Dodddington, the village of Little Irchester and the western part of the village of Irchester. It is crossed from east to west by the new A45 trunk road which comes from Northampton which is to the south-east. The valley of the River Nene extends from the south-west corner to the north centre of the area. It also includes the A509 road from Wellingborough to Newport Pagnell. Most of the land area is rural and is used for various types of farming. Part of the developing county of Northampton shire the area has seen great change in recent years. The valley of the River Nene is destined to be radically altered in the immediate future because of gravel extraction.
